attributes.action: move the emphasis in the battle against global warming towards reversing the growth in global population in general and in the uk in particular.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a limit to the number of people that the world can accommodate. Many of today’s problems, particularly global warming, but also traffic problems, shortage of fresh water and raw materials, even wars can be traced to overpopulation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
